Author: fishonthesun
Text: My moms onto me in that way. Home cooked meal? Me, causually, "oh what's all in it?" Her, *starts listing the basic ingredients, stops at two* "I'm not gonna tell you everything! You just have to eat it" Me: *internal panic bc unknown calories*

Author: scaredyk4t
Text: OMG! I work in the food industry/aspiring and hoping to be a chef so it’s fun to constantly ask about food and what’s in whatever someone’s making. Also I have a reason to check labels. “Oh that’s all processed shit and I can make that myself at home!” when in reality I’m just checking calories and I’m a fucking hypocrite for drinking copious amounts of diet drinks...  I’m also weirdly good at guessing measurements now.
